nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Villains: A Pop-up Storybook

Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Villains: A Pop-up Storybook is a young-readers book based on the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series. It was written by Rob Valois and published by Grosset & Dunlap on October 28, 2010. It is the follow-up to Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Heroes: A Pop-up Storybook.
